name: kef-streamdeck
description: unofficial stream deck plugin to control kef speaker

scripts.build-win: npm run cleanRelease && npm run pkg && npm run copyApp-win && npm run copyHTML-win && npm run copyImages-win && npm run exportPlugin-win
scripts.build-mac: npm run cleanRelease && npm run pkg && npm run copyApp-mac && npm run copyHTML-mac && npm run copyImages-mac && npm run exportPlugin-mac
scripts.pkg: pkg app.js && mv app-macos app && mv app-win.exe app.exe
scripts.copyApp-mac: cp app app.exe ~/Library/Application\ Support/com.elgato.StreamDeck/Plugins/com.patrickdmiller.kef.sdPlugin/ && cp -rf propertyinspector/* ~/Library/Application\ Support/com.elgato.StreamDeck/Plugins/com.patrickdmiller.kef.sdPlugin/propertyinspector/ && cp manifest-mac.json ~/Library/Application\ Support/com.elgato.StreamDeck/Plugins/com.patrickdmiller.kef.sdPlugin/manifest.json
scripts.copyApp-win: cp app app.exe ./com.patrickdmiller.kef.sdPlugin/ && cp -rf propertyinspector/* ./com.patrickdmiller.kef.sdPlugin/propertyinspector/ && cp manifest-win.json ./com.patrickdmiller.kef.sdPlugin/manifest.json
